name: TV
description: Family has 3 young school-going children. Recently their television and stopped working and they are hoping to have a second hand tv they can install in their home. Not fussy about size or type.

passiton.name: TV Console
passiton.description: Bought from Starliving at tampines on January 2023. Still in good condition, eventhough there is a use and tear marks. Try to change a bigger tv console to store some my kids books.

name: 2-door fridge
description: Elderly malay aunty 60 plus yrs old living in HDB rental flat needs mid-size (i.e., 200 to 300L or approx 600x1650mm) 2-door fridge. The thermostat of her current fridge is faulty. Many Thanks.

contact.org: Moral Active Ageing Centre @ Kaki Bukit
contact.name: Gary Tan

name: Dryer
description: The family consists of the client, her husband, and their three young children (ages 1.5, 3, and 5). Due to caregiving responsibilities and health-related challenges, there is currently no income earner in the household. As a result, the family struggles to meet even their basic needs and relies heavily on both formal and informal support systems. Given their financial constraints, they are unable to afford repairs or replacements for these essential household appliances which they have requested support for. The family hopes to receive a clothes dryer. Donor to cover transport arrangement and delivery cost please. Thank you!

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Tasya Puspita Maulany

name: Fridge
description:
The family consists of a daughter in her 40s and a mother in her late 70s. Both are homebound due to their medical conditions that causes them to have limitations in their mobility and they would regularly experience light-headedness that could potentially cause them to fall.

As both are not able to work, they are currently relying on some government payout and financial assistance. They would purchase some groceries and would cook meals and place their meals in the fridge to last them for a few days.They would also place some food items for prayers in their fridge as well. 

As their fridge are not functioning well lately, they would like to seek some help in getting a new fridge (as they are strict vegetarian) so that they could continue to store their meals and prayer items in the fridge. Thank you!
specifications: (w X h X d): 545 X 1700 X 625mm

name: Fridge
description: Family comprises a single mother and her daughter. Mother has health issues and hence faces increased expenses, but is continuing work to maintain their household expenses. Their refrigerator has spoiled and they require a new one to store their food items.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Jalan Besar and Toa Payoh
contact.name: Emilyn Teo

name: Oven
description: Beneficiary is a senior with mobility issues as he is recovering from hip replacement surgery. He is not working and relies on SSO assistance. Would like to have an oven to heat up/bake dishes so as to save some money

contact.org: Allkin Singapore's Active Ageing Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 469
contact.name: Kei Ng

passiton.name: Electrolux Oven 56L
passiton.description:
Oven for roasting, grilling, baking, stew. Well maintained and good working condition. All accessories included. Owner  
upgraded to larger oven.

name: Air Purifier
description: Family of 5 with 3 school-going children staying in a 2-room rental flat requires an air purifier for one of the child that has eczema . Mum is working odd jobs and this air purifier will benefit the family's living condition. Would greatly appreciate if donor is able to cover transport expenses.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Mohamad Harith

passiton.name: Air Purifier
passiton.description: 2 pieces. I will deliver to area near district 12 only example Jalan Besar, Balestier, Geylang Bahru etc.
passiton.location: Beach Road, Bencoolen Road, Bugis, Golden Mile, Middle Road, Rocher

name: Fridge
description:
Seeking for a new fridge for two senior co-tenants (F/73 and F/77) who are relocating under the SERS programme in Oct.
Their current fridge is no longer functioning and will be discarded. A new fridge is essential to ensure proper food storage and to prevent contamination or spoilage, which can pose serious health risks. Any support with a new fridge would be greatly appreciated. Thank you for making a difference! To support, please WhatsApp Elaine at 8777 0960 or email elaine.fu@thkmc.org.sg"

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid

name: Fridge
description: The family recently moved to a rental flat. mom and elder daughter work part-time, while the younger child is still in school. Their fridge has broken down, and they are in need of a replacement.

name: Mattress (Queen-size)
description: Young single mother with infant. They will be moving to their rental unit soon but lack some household items. Mother is looking for job to support herself and her child.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Woodlands, Sembawang
contact.name: Genessa Soh

passiton.name: Sofa, Dining Table and Queen Size Mattress
passiton.description: Sofa and Dining table with chairs and bench

name: Single Bed
description: Mother of 6 children requires a single bed mattress for her eldest son who recently met with a vehicular accident. She hopes that it would help with her son's recovery as family are currently sharing the sleeping space.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Muhammad Danial Bin Mazlan

passiton.name: Single bed frame
passiton.description: Used Single bed frame by my child for 10 years. Bought from Star Furniture. Some scratches on the frame, in usable condition. Giving away as we are changing to bunk bed frame.

passiton.name: Brown colour Super Single Bed and Mattress
passiton.description: This is a super single sized bed frame and will come with magttress.  Please collect it only in November with date to be advised soon.

name: Queen Size Mattress
description: A family has 5 children ranging from primary school to a new born. The father just lost his food delivery job as he just lost his e-bike. The mother just gave birth and is on confinement. The family requires a queen size mattress.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Tampines, Punggol  & Pasir Ris
contact.name: Premilla d/0 Gunasekaran

passiton.name: Sofa, Dining Table and Queen Size Mattress
passiton.description: Sofa and Dining table with chairs and bench

name: Tablet
description:
Mr Hong, age 90, widowed lives with his nephew who is mute, deaf and intellectually disabled. 

Nephew does not work and stays at home most of the time. while he has been to a special needs school during his teenage years, he is not able to be meaningfully employed in the later years

a tablet would enable him to learn materials through videos, and for faster communication when social worker needs to reach out to him

passiton.name: Tall side Tablet
passiton.description: Is a wooden side tall side table, look brand new
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Milk
description: The family has three young dependents, including a 2-year-old boy who still needs milk formula due to his picky eating habits. The family is currently facing financial difficulties, as both parents are unemployed. They would benefit from receiving milk formula support.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Andrea Tan

passiton.name: Isomil Infant Milk
passiton.description: Donated soy-based milk but child has aged out the infant formula. Infant milk is for 0-12mths.

name: Playpen
description:
Family of 11 requires a PLAYPEN (size of baby cot) for second youngest son to play in away from newborn. Free space in house is very limited, hence size should not exceed size of a baby cot. Ideal for playpen to be on the floor (as child likes to jump) and have higher walls.

*Donor to cover delivery please

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Hougang
contact.name: Ang Hua Jun

passiton.name: Playpen
passiton.description: It is a used playpen without the playmat. It comes with handle rings and balls.
